detectors.description:
Bentolock.constructor(address,uint256).admin_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#191) lacks a zero-check on :
		- admin = admin_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#195)

Bentolock.setPendingAdmin(address).pendingAdmin_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#220) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingAdmin = pendingAdmin_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#228)

Bentolock.executeTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256).target (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#253) lacks a zero-check on :
		- (success,returnData) = target.call.value(value)(callData) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#272)

Reentrancy in Bentolock.executeTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#253-278):
	External calls:
	- (success,returnData) = target.call.value(value)(callData) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#272)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ExecuteTransaction(txHash,target,value,signature,data,eta) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#275)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Bentolock.executeTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#L253-L278):
	External calls:
	- [(success,returnData) = target.call.value(value)(callData)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#L272)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ExecuteTransaction(txHash,target,value,signature,data,eta)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#L275)

detectors.description:
Bentolock.executeTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#253-278) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(getBlockTimestamp() >= eta,Bentolock::executeTransaction: Transaction hasn't surpassed time lock.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#258)
	- require(bool,string)(getBlockTimestamp() <= eta.add(GRACE_PERIOD),Bentolock::executeTransaction: Transaction is stale.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bentolock.sol#259)

acceptAdmin() should be declared external:

setPendingAdmin(address) should be declared external:

queueTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256) should be declared external:

cancelTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256) should be declared external:

executeTransaction(address,uint256,string,bytes,uint256) should be declared external:
